<:WTS:708489317168971778> <:WTT:711683426469544006> <:mgb:512765989612683275> <:agb:512767465588129792> [Indiana, USA, willing to ship if you're willing to pay, prefer local pickup] I have a few things laying around doing nothing, so hoping maybe someone else will need them!  

-***OEM Black Gameboy Pocket Shell***, with screws,  aftermarket buttons and membranes, some light scratches on the lens.  Does not include OEM battery cover, has an aftermarket transparent orange cover
$10

-***Authentic GBA cartridges:*** **Mario Kart Super Circuit** - $10 (writing on label); **Megaman Battle Network 2 ** - $45 (label damage); **Spyro Season of Ice** - $8; **Shark Tale** (lol) [not pictured] - will throw in for free with one of other games [most will include a dust cover]

-***Repro GBA cartridges*** (flash, no save issues as of yet, bought in 2016): **Mother 3** (1.2 English translation); **Super Mario Advance**; **Super Mario Advance 4** (eReader levels VC version); **Metroid Zero Mission**; **Pokemon Ultra Violet Version** (rom hack) - $5 each [all have a dust cover]

-***Random bag o' loose GBA bs***: screws, buttons, rubbers, bumpers, and even a bunk cheapo frontlight that for whatever reason has a black line through it - not really worried about price on this one, even willing just to throw it in for free with something else lol.

If you're up for trades, I am ISO a Gameboy Color (willing to trade entire lot for a GBC, wishful thinking I know lmfaoüòù ), Tennis or Baseball for GB,  or an OEM Gameboy Pocket LCD for sure, but willing to hear any other offers

Willing to ship if buyer pays shipping, but would prefer local pickup if possible.

<:WTB:708489317357584415> [USA-NC] [H] PayPal [W] (FACEPLATE ONLY) Final Fantasy Limited Edition Gameboy Micro, 3D Modeling Help

Preferably a faceplate with the screen lens in Good condition, please DM me with pictures!

Also I am looking for someone with a Micro who has good 3D modeling skills to refine this 3D scan of the back plastic frame and post on Thingiverse for everyone, like how Makho did with the front plastic frame to make it a good 3D-printable piece. I'm not sure how much extra refinement is needed or how much I would need to pay, but I don't know anything about anything, so whoever wants to complete the plastic frame set for everyone, here's the link: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:5146645
